name: Terrorists win ?
description:
You are leading hostages. You need to help them to escape, without getting shot. Quick ! Try to save at least one of them !

Lot of stuuf to do, not enough time :

  • More hostages
  • More interactions and a more complicated scenario to escape

Maybe in a post compo build :)

I will post more informaiton tomorrow but I have to sleep.

Stop to read now if you want to search the oslution fo the game by yourself… spoiler incmong. You need to go close to the shelf to untied an hostage,t hen get the rope and tie in front of the bar. Then you have to push the table close. The terrorist will fall with the head on the tabl and die. Hurray you can fly away !
